title: NEOPlex -"Solid Lime Green" Complete Flag Kit - Includes 12' Swooper Feather Business Flag with 15-Foot Anodized Aluminum Flagpole and Ground Spike
features: Includes everything you need to get this flag up and grabbing customer's attention
Swooper feather flag is nearly 2 1/2' wide x 12' tall (extra wide flags are over 3' wide)
Heavy-duty, anodized aluminum 15-foot pole AND ground spike included
Flag is made from a heavy-duty and colorfast (150-denier) polyester knit material
Pole sleeve runs the entire length of the flag
description: This magnificent swooper feather business flag set from NEOPlex includes everything you need to get your message out there and seen. The flag is nearly 2 1/2 feet wide and is 12 feet tall (extra wide swooper flags are over 3 feet wide). The flag has a pole sleeve that runs the entire length of the flag. The 15-foot pole is made out of anodized aluminum and breaks down into 4-pieces for easy storage or travel and is very easy to assemble. When mounted on the pole, the flag is OVER 15 feet high! Also included is a heavy-duty ground spike that is solid anodized aluminum that you can really hammer on if necessary. It can be used in dirt, grass, and even asphalt (not concrete). Get your message out there and easily seen at all times with this complete flag kit from NEOPlex.
